## Description

Mengimplementasikan modul game **Puzzle** secara lengkap yang mencakup:
1. **Puzzle CRUD**: Create, Read, Update, dan Delete puzzle (dengan upload gambar).
2. **Game Logic**: Endpoint untuk Start Game dan Finish Game (kalkulasi score, move count, time).
3. **Fitur Tambahan**: Leaderboard, Difficulty Filter (Easy, Medium, Hard), dan Upload Image terpisah.
4. **Fixes**: Memperbaiki `validator.middleware` untuk upload array file dan logika permission edit di `game.service`.

## Type of Change

- [x] Bug Fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [x] New Feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking Change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [x] Documentation Update
